import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import api from'../utils/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserList=_ref=>{let{onUserSelect}=_ref;const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchUsers=async()=>{const res=await api.get('/skills/users');setUsers(res.data);};fetchUsers();},[]);const handleAddSkills=userId=>{onUserSelect(userId);navigate("/add-skill/".concat(userId));// Navigate to the SkillForm page with the user ID
};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-2xl mx-auto mt-8 p-6 bg-white rounded shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl mb-6",children:"Users and Their Skills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"mb-4 p-4 border border-gray-300 rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"font-bold",children:user.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:user.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Skills: ",user.skills.map(skill=>skill.name).join(', ')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"mt-2 p-2 bg-blue-500 text-white rounded",onClick:()=>handleAddSkills(user._id),children:"Add Skills"})]},user._id))})]});};export default UserList;
